title: 玩家聊天彩色字体 怎么禁
author: mxxs
txt_content:
[size=12.380952835083008px] /mangdelp builder essentials.chat.color   [size=12.380952835083008px]/mangdelp builder essentials.msg.color 这两个都不行  老提示一行红字  似乎是用户组里没有这个权限的意思
[size=12.380952835083008px]           红字如下  the group dosn't have  direct  access to  that permission

replies.author: mxxs
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-18 13:07
mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.color
谢了   LOL

replies.author: mxxs
replies.txt_content:
